Title: Relates to the licensing requirement of an individual acting as a transportation network company driver
Summary: Relates to changing the licensing requirement to allow drivers with valid driver's licenses from other states to act as a transportation network company driver in New York.
LawCode: Amd ยง1696, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the licensing requirement of an individual acting as a transportation network company driver
